title: Zyra FanArt! (Made by me)

embed.description: Finished my @LeagueOfLegends's Zyra :33 Retweets and Faves are always appreciated :3 pic.twitter.com/0WwDrmDuqb

body:
Decided I would post the Zyra Fan art I made awhile ago, See what ya'll think.
Took me roughly 2 hours to make, Probably one of my best pieces of art I've done. ^.^

(Says KorriPocky because that's my main In-game name for every other game - You can check my Twitter ^.^)

Let me know what you think :D

Also If you want to play norms feel free to add me in-game or on skype!
Ign: SweatyNerd
Skype: gdqx6gmp

:33

replies.body: This is cool :) Now I need to go play Zyra damnit.
i was thinking the exact same!

This is really really good!
if you don't mind me asking whats your technique for doing the strands in the hair? i can never get hair to look this good.
She needs to be more fierce!! haha nah looks great! good stuff!{{champion:143}}
Nice work! It was zyra who got me to gold from low silver in season 4!

this is unb-leaf-ably gorgeous, yo !! 
keep up the good work ^ ^
